response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.6 餓狼伝説 SPECIAL
response.overview: Gamest Video Vol. 6: Fatal Fury Special  Color / 120 min / Stereo / December 11, 1993  Shinseisha GV-006  Wolves hungry for battle—that's them!  ★The Fatal Fury series is even more powerful with the addition of the Three Warriors, Krauser, and Geese!  ★Gamest brings the fighting generation's masterpiece to video with a bang!  1. 15 Garou Gather Here!! Character Introduction  Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Azuma, Big Bear, Jubei Yamada, Chin Shinzan, Kim Kaphwan, Mai Shiranui  Duck King, Tang Fu Lu, Billy Kane, Axel Hawk, Lawrence Blood, Geese Howard, Wolfgang Krauser, Ryo Sakazaki  2. Aim for the Top of Garou!! Strategies Against CPUs ~Part 1~  3. Strike Without a Moment to Breathe!! The World of Gorgeous Combinations!!  4. Garou Reaches Its Peak!! Strategies Against CPUs ~Part 2~  5. The Ultimate Challenger Appears!! The Invincible Dragon, Ryo Sakazaki!!  6. Who is the True Garou!? Fierce Battle Edition!!
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.6 - FATAL FURY SPECIAL
